title: The Alter-Ego of Insanity
description: Gino Poletti discovered the truth to the rumors concerning his father at the age of sixteen. His father Angelo was indeed the Boss to one of Chicago’s biggest crime families, the Abato Crime Family. That fateful night opened up a whole new world for Gino. Not only did he discover the truth about his father, he also discovered the euphoric feeling he’d receive by killing people and watching them die. Will Gino’s father accept his son’s obsession with the dead? What will become of Gino and his father’s position in the Abato Crime Family should it be revealed that Gino is in fact a necrophiliac?
author: Reyna Hawk
